{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = We talked about him.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = So this is an update to the guidelines for dealing with aircraft piracy, which makes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Defense Command and changing them to North American Aerospace Defense Command.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:54.119

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = to pretend that they're making far more sweeping changes than they actually are.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:01.980
    | text      = In this case, the argument that Alex is putting forth is that the document made it so only
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:05.599
    | text      = Donald Rumsfeld, the Secretary of Defense, could have any say about shooting down civilian
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:10.000
    | text      = aircraft, whereas previously any old general could make that determination.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:13.659
    | text      = Any old general.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:15.159
    | text      = This is absolutely not true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:16.960
    | text      = This document updated an almost identical document for 1997, and it doesn't change anything
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:21.659
    | text      = about the chain of responsibility for decision making.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:25.400
    | text      = In both, they say that the FAA is responsible for monitoring flights and requesting help
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:29.820
    | text      = from the Department of Defense if they feel like it's needed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:33.099

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:38.880
    | text      = of a hijacking, the National Military Command Center will be notified by the most expeditious
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:43.980
    | text      = means by the FAA.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:46.280
    | text      = The NMCC will, with the exception of immediate responses as authorized by reference D, forward
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:51.760
    | text      = requests for DOD assistance to the Secretary of Defense for approval.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:56.739
    | text      = When the document says, with the exception of immediate responses as authorized by reference
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:00.480
    | text      = D, it's talking about DOD policy that predated this document and wasn't changed by it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:06.079
    | text      = Essentially, federal military commanders had the authority to respond to emergencies immediately
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:10.260
    | text      = if it was a situation where they could not reasonably get the permission from the Secretary
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:14.739
    | text      = of Defense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:15.739
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:16.739
    | text      = It's pretty clear from the language of the document that this authority to respond doesn't
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:27.119

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:58.920

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:02.079
    | text      = Oh, there's so much more here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:04.559
    | text      = Here in the hour, I'm going to read over some of Senate bill 742 because people can't believe
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:09.880
    | text      = this and I want to read over it again about putting you in a forest labor camp for life.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:16.079

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:20.079
    | text      = of the other crimes you get life in prison for if they're able to pass this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:26.000
    | text      = And here's the deal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:28.780

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:49.780
    | text      = Another thing that's been a constant thread through Alex's career is the insistence that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:52.739
    | text      = he's going to go to calls and not talk.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:57.519
    | text      = Whatever you want.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:58.519
    | text      = He's been trying to do that for 20 years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:59.519
    | text      = We have seen that a lot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:01.039
    | text      = Now I've heard Alex constantly talk about this supposed bill that would make everyone
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:04.599
    | text      = at a protest subjected to internment in a forest labor camp if someone blocks traffic,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:08.679
    | text      = but I'd never actually heard the specific bill number.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:11.539
    | text      = Now that I have, I can look into it a little.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:13.840
    | text      = In 2004 we were in the middle of the 108th session of Congress and in that session, S742
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:19.800
    | text      = was titled the International Disability and Victims of Warfare Civil Strife Assistance
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:24.800
    | text      = Act of 2003.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:25.800
    | text      = Okay, if I understand, that is the bill that will outlaw all protest and put everybody
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:31.199
    | text      = in jail forever.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:32.199
    | text      = Well, I mean, I'm just, this is the first place you look.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:34.920
    | text      = All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:35.920
    | text      = So it was introduced by a Republican from Kansas, Sam Brownback, and has literally zero
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:39.960
    | text      = to do with the stuff that Alex is talking about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:42.159
    | text      = It was also referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations in March 2003 and died there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:46.960
    | text      = I thought that maybe Alex was talking about a bill from the House and I accidentally said
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:50.159
    | text      = Senate, so I checked HR 742, but that was a proposed code change to reduce the age you're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:55.079
    | text      = eligible for military retirement pay from 60 to 55.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:58.039
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:59.039
    | text      = Well, that's nice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:00.039
    | text      = Yeah, but it clearly isn't it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:01.039
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:02.039
    | text      = So then I decided to check the 107th Congress, the previous one, but S742 that year was the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:06.280
    | text      = Retirement Security and Savings Act of 2001, which also died in committee.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:10.440
    | text      = Yeah, that sounds right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:11.440
    | text      = In the 106th Congress, S742 is a clarification on the requirements that would be needed to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:16.519
    | text      = be met for China to join the World Trade Organization, which also died in committee.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:20.679
    | text      = That makes sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:21.679
    | text      = In the 105th Congress, it was a bill promoting adoption.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:24.719
    | text      = There just isn't a bill with this number.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:26.679
    | text      = It matches Alex's story in any way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:29.440
    | text      = So a little later in this episode, Alex reads from a blog post about this bill and because
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:33.179
    | text      = he used precise language that's used in this blog, I was able to trace it down and get
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:37.559
    | text      = to the bottom of this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:39.000
    | text      = It's not a bill in the U.S. Senate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:40.800
    | text      = It's in the Oregon State Senate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:42.679
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:43.679
    | text      = And it didn't pass.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:44.679
    | text      = Wow.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:45.679
    | text      = Already.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:46.679
    | text      = By the time Alex is talking about it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:47.679
    | text      = Great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:48.679
    | text      = Great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:49.679
    | text      = Alex's version of this is very cartoonish and disconnected from reality, but it also
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:51.420
    | text      = is way too broadly written to be an effective law.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:55.239
    | text      = It was essentially trying to create a catch-all type of offense called the crime of terrorism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:59.840
    | text      = But as you can well imagine, terrorism is a term that has a million meanings.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:02.900
    | text      = So trying to legislate a clear definition of it isn't going to be a smooth process.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:06.719
    | text      = Anybody who does something to make you afraid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:09.119
    | text      = Oh no, this is going to be.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:11.480
    | text      = In effect, this was meant to supplement already existing laws and crimes in Oregon by adding
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:16.360
    | text      = this terrorism distinction, which would allow for life sentences for people who commit other
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:20.480
    | text      = crimes in furtherance of terrorist goals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:22.760
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:23.760
    | text      = The issue is that some of these crimes that it was meant to apply to made sense, like
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:26.800
    | text      = giving and receiving bribes, but it also extended things like dog fighting and the unlawful
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:31.800
    | text      = distribution of cigarettes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:33.280
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:34.280
    | text      = I was going to say, is the IRA a huge problem in the Oregon at this time?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:37.639
    | text      = Maybe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:38.639
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:39.639
    | text      = I understand the intention of the bill, which is obviously to enable the state to more harshly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:43.179
    | text      = prosecute terrorists for adjacent crimes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:45.639
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:46.639
    | text      = But it's also not really well thought out, and because of how nebulously it has to be
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:49.719
    | text      = written, it opens the door to the kind of propaganda optics that these games that Alex
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:54.719
    | text      = likes to play.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:55.719
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
